name: operately
description: Operately is a self-hosted planning and execution framework for teams. It enables goal setting, progress tracking, meeting agendas, and weekly updates in a clean collaborative dashboard.
features: Goal setting: Define company and team objectives with key results and measurable targets for aligned execution.
Progress tracking: Update goal status regularly and visualize completion percentages across all initiatives.
Weekly updates: Share team progress, blockers, and plans through structured weekly check-in reports.
Meeting agendas: Create and share meeting notes with action items and decisions for transparent communication.
Project management: Track initiatives with milestones, owners, and deadlines linked to strategic goals.
Team dashboard: View all active goals, projects, and updates in a unified interface for organizational visibility.
Notifications: Receive alerts when updates are posted, goals are at risk, or action items are assigned.
Retrospectives: Conduct periodic reviews of completed goals to learn and improve team execution processes.
